comments.body: just a structural comment: it's a little weird to use commonjs syntax for submodules, but have the resulting module be an ES6 module. It might be more elegant to have submodules export their individual items instead of using `export = ...` and then use the syntax `export { IncomingFrameStream } from "./lib/IncomingFrameStream"`.
I’m on the bus, so I’ll have to test this later, but I think you have to say `export = { IncomingFrameStream: typeof IncomingFrameStream, ... }`. What you have here is fine however.
